Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That pouch is full.<sp:5:1:0> Maybe you should
organize it and clean it out.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Goron City is cool these days, but the
<clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>are still piping hot. A little Hylian
like you would get scorched.
<clr:0000>Fireproof elixir <clr:ffff>will lose its effect after
some time, but you'll be A-OK wearing the
<clr:0000>flame-resistant equipment <clr:ffff>we have here.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Wakeup>I hate dealing with customers.<sp:5:0:0> Bug Pyle
outside<sp:5:0:0> with whatever questions you got.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Only reason I'm still runnin' this place is
'cause Boss Bludo will get mad if I close
up shop.
If I had it my way?<sp:5:0:0> I'd quit and live out
my days covered in a massive pile of
beautiful <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Wakeup>Hey.<sp:5:0:0> You've already got what we're
offerin'.<sp:5:1:0> So you don't really need my
help. Buzz off, will ya?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>We're fresh outta stuff to sell.<sp:5:0:0> But we're
happy to buy your stuff!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Wakeup>All our products are sold out.<sp:5:0:0> So there's
not much I can do for you. Buzz off,
will ya?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>The <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>are still piping hot. A little
Hylian like you would get scorched.

<clr:0000>Fireproof elixir <clr:ffff>will lose its effect after
some time, but you'll be A-OK wearing the
<clr:0000>flame-resistant equipment <clr:ffff>we have here.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>Then<sp:5:0:0> show me what you want to sell.
ShopBefore:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Greeting_00>Hey. <sp:5:0:0>You doin' some work in the caves?


Back when Death Mountain was active,
this area had tons of lava.

<clr:0000>Flame-resistant equipment <clr:ffff>was really
popular at that time.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Nowadays <sp:5:0:0>the only folks who buy the stuff
are Hylians or lava lovers who work in the
<clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>for <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>.
So that's why I'm selling it dirt cheap.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Gotta be lazy if ya can't be bothered to
remove your clothes before sellin' 'em.
ShopAfter:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Once Death Mountain stopped erupting,
this area cooled down a lot.

But there's still lava<sp:5:0:0> inside the <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>.


<snd:Happy_00><clr:0000>Flame-resistant equipment<clr:ffff> is still useful
for those areas, at least.<sp:5:0:0> And I'm sellin' it
at a very discounted price.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're gonna work in the caves,
<clr:0000>flame-resistant equipment <clr:ffff>would be
useful for ya.
And it's your lucky dayâ€”it's discounted
right now!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Greeting_00>*sigh*...<sp:5:0:0> A customer?<sp:5:0:0> Only reason I'm still
runnin' this place is 'cause Boss Bludo will
get mad if I close up shop.
If I had it my way?<sp:5:0:0> I'd quit and live out
my days covered in a massive pile of
beautiful <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
